content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0. Juan Mata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fernando Torres.
Attempt missed. Nicolas Anelka (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross.
John Obi Mikel (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
